Once ready, the bricks are given to traders coming to his community who then deliver the bricks to other cities. Thanks to this activity they can get ahead as well as the people her husband employs, who succeed in providing for their families on a daily basis thanks to their job.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy clay to male bricks. She has been a member of this Communal Bank since the beginning and she likes it because through this mean she can contribute to the family’s expenses.

Her wish is for her children never to be in need.

loans.use: To buy clay.

loans.name: Yacouba

texts.fr:
Monsieur Yacouba, célibataire sans enfant, est né en  juin 1977 à San. Il vit dans une famille traditionnelle  chez son grand frère à Dioïla, Région de Koulikoro République du Mali.        
Yacouba  est un éleveur et commerçant de bétail, installé à son compte il y’a un bon moment. Il s’approvisionne en béliers dans les coins de brousse, et les nourrit pendant quelques temps afin de leur faire gagner un peu de poids, et après il les vend aux clients soit à Bamako ou à Dioïla. Il enregistre  une vingtaine de tête dans sa bergerie.  Avec ce prêt, il compte acheter une vingtaine de béliers et de l’aliment bétail. Monsieur Yacouba est à son deuxième prêt. Le précédent s’est bien dénoué. Il affirme que la période idéale est ce moment précis car nous sommes à l’approche de la Tabaski.  La vente est organisée  un ou deux mois avant la fête de Tabaski, voir quelques jours. 
 Yacouba  espère  réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 90.000 FCFA. Ce bénéfice sera utiliser pour acheter des vaches en reformes et des Taurillon pour l’embouche.
texts.en:
Mr. Yacouba, who is unmarried and without children, was born in June 1977 in San. He lives in a traditional family at his older brother's house in Dioïla, Région de Koulikoro, Republic of Mali.        
Yacouba is a livestock farmer and livestock merchant established on his own for a while. He gets his supplies of rams from the countryside and feeds them for a while in order to earn more from the weight gain. Then he sells them to customers, either in Bamako or in Dioïla. He counts about 20 head in his flock.

With this loan, he intends to purchase about 20 rams and some feed. The previous loan was indeed settled. He asserts that the ideal period is right now because the Tabaski holiday is approaching. The sales are arranged a month or two before Tabaski, actually within days.

Yacouba hopes to make an average monthly profit of 90,000 francs CFA. This profit will be used to purchase spent cows and young bulls to fatten.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Justine

texts.en:
Justine lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married, with two children, and one is in school. She has no additional family members. 

Justine operates a beauty salon at the market on a retail basis. She has been in business for the last seven years. She gets additional income from operating a retail shop. She works six days a week.  

Justine has requested a loan of UGX 200,000 (Uganda shillings) from Micro Credit for Development and Transformation SACCO (MCDT SACCO) to buy hair treatments, relaxers, shampoo, and rollers. Her major business challenge is electricity. Her goals and aspirations are to improve her sales and also to buy a plot of land. 

She lives in a rented house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include medications, school fees, and food.

loans.use: to buy relaxers, oils, and hair treatments for her salon.

loans.name: Nazia

texts.en: Nazia is a 27-year-old vigorous lady. She has been stitching clothes for many years. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to lack of availability of funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. For this reason she requested a loan of 30,000 PKR from Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan to buy more spools of thread in different colors, as well as packs of lace, zippers and buttons. She hopes to create a means of increasing revenues so she may be able to generate more income. She is in her second loan cycle and thankful to Kashf for its tremendous support.

loans.use: to buy more spools of thread in different colors, as well as lace, zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Erica Yamileth

texts.es:
Erica tiene 27 años de edad una joven con mucho futuro, emprendedora, comerciante y agricultora, casada y madre de 2 hijos los cuales están en la escuela en diferentes grados de educación, con un grado de educación primario completado cursado hasta el sexto grado. En compañía de su esposo se dedican a la siembra de maíz, frijol y arroz como también tiene una pequeña pulpería la cual tiene surtida con lo básico y necesario para su clientela. Uno de los desafíos que ella encuentra en el mantenimiento y asistencia de sus cultivo son los precios altos de los insumos que ayudan al crecimiento, calidad y sanidad de sus cultivos ya que son caros y las ganancias que quedan son pocas para poder asistirlas como debe de ser.

Con la solicitud de un financiamiento que hoy solicita a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para dar asistencia técnica a sus cultivos ella busca obtener una buena cosecha, un mejor rendimiento de sus cultivos y mejores ganancias. 

Sus planes son los de ahorra un poco más para poder hacer algunos arreglos a sus casa de habitación que son necesarios como el repello el cual evitara la humedad en las paredes, poner un piso de mosaico, entre otros. Sus sueños es apoyar a sus hijos en todo lo necesario y verlos graduados, con carrera universitarias y de provecho que hagan de ellos mejores personas en el futuro.
texts.en:
Erica is 27 years old. She is a young woman with a great future as she is an entrepreneur, shopkeeper and farmer. She is married with 2 children who are at different stages of their school education. She has completed primary education up to the sixth grade. Together with her husband Erica grows corn, beans and rice as well as having a small grocery store which she keeps stocked with basic needs for her customers.

One of the challenges she faces in tending her crops is the high prices of the supplies which promote the growth, quality and health of her crops since they are expensive and the profits which are left over are small and do not benefit them as much as they should do.

Erica is now asking for a loan from the COMIXMUL co-operative which she will use for technical support for her crops and hopes this will give her a good harvest, a better yield of her crops and better profits. 

She plans to save a bit more so she can make some necessary improvements to her house, including whitewashing, which will prevent damp in the walls, and laying a tiled floor. Her dream is to help her children with everything they need and see them graduate with worthwhile university degrees which will make them better people in the future.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for growing corn, beans and rice.

loans.name: Sara Ruth

texts.es: Doña Sara tiene 50 años de edad, es casada y vive con su esposo y dos hijas las cuales están estudiando una en secundaria y la otra en la universidad. Ella es costurera desde hace 8 años, también se dedica a la venta por catálogo y bolsas para regalos que confecciona ella misma.Doña Sara necesita este crédito para pagar parte de los estudios de su hija ya es difícil para ellos pagar la universidad privada donde esta su hija, pero el esfuerzo lo desean hacer para lograr que su hija se supere y tenga la oportunidad de integrarse al campo laboral. Doña Sara desea continuar con su actividad, le va muy bien en sus ventas, aunque el crédito no sea para su actividad, se les presenta una necesidad familiar que deben resolver, ella desea este préstamo para en un futuro ver a su hija como toda una profesional. Eligió a Fundación Mujer porque esta segura que es la única financiera que le prestaría para cumplir este sueño.
texts.en:
Sara, 50, is married and lives with her husband and two daughters, one of whom attends middle school, while the other is in college. She has been a seamstress for eight years and also sells catalog merchandise and gift bags that she makes herself. Sara needs a loan to pay for part of her daughter's college studies. It is hard for her as her daughter attends a private university, but she wants to do this so that her daughter can succeed and have better work opportunities. 

Sara wants to keep working at her jobs, as sales have been good. Though this loan is not for her work, it would meet a need that the family must resolve. Sara wants this loan so that she can see her daughter follow a professional career. She chose Fundación Mujer because she is knows this is the only funding available to achieve her dream.

loans.use: to pay her daughter's college fees.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente vive con su familia en casa alquilada, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y eso le  ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, sus cosechas las comercia en los alrededores de la comunidad, ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad, los buenos precios y sobre todo por el buen servicio; el cliente necesita invertir en sus siembras por eso le solicita un crédito que le permita comprar semillas, insecticida, herbicida, fertilizantes, abonos  etc. el cliente es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez confía que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
The client lives with his family in a rented house and is dedicated to cultivating corn and sorghum. He has worked in agriculture for various years and this has provided much experience, which permits him to obtain the best harvests. He sells his produce in the surrounding community. He now has a large clientele that prefers his produce for its quality, good prices, and above all, for his good service. 

The client needs to invest in his plantings. For this reason, he is requesting a loan that will allow him to purchase seeds, insecticide, herbicide, fertilizers, manure, etc. 

The client is very responsible and assures us that he will pay off the debt in the established time period. At the same time, he is confident that this will bring economic security to his home.

loans.use: buy seeds, insecticides, herbicides, fertilizers, manure, etc., for his crops.

loans.name: Danaya Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Danaya, est  composé de femmes mariées, qui ont en moyenne 38 ans, 5 enfants et vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles élargies dans la ville de Fana, quartier Badialan, Région de Koulikoro (deuxième région administrative de la république du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Elles font le commerce de condiments, de l’habillement, de la glace, du charbon de bois, du lait des produits cosmétiques et  du savon.                                                                
Les femmes du groupe Danaya sont à leur treizième  prêt solidaire qui sera utilisé pour acheter leurs marchandises déjà citées. 
La cliente Kadia  la première personne à partir de la gauche compte acheter  12 pièces de pagnes wax à Bamako. Son cycle d’achat est mensuel. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 45000 FCFA.
texts.en:
The group Danaya is composed of married women, who average 38 years of age and five children each, all living in traditional extended families in Fana City, in the Badialan district, Région de Koulikoro (2nd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). They women know one another through ties of kinship, community, and friendship. They do commerce in condiments, clothing, ice, charcoal, milk, cosmetics, and soap.

The women of the group Danaya are on their thirteenth solidarity loan that will be used to purchase their merchandise as mentioned above.

This client, Kadia, who is the first person from the left in the photo, intends to purchase 12 lengths of Wax 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa) from Bamako. Her buying cycle is monthly. She plans on making a monthly profit of 45,000 francs CFA.

loans.use: to purchase Wax 'pagne' cloth to sell

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es: Maribel tiene 26 años, está casada y tiene una pequeña hija de 2 años de edad con quien vive en su casa propia construida a base de madera. Maribel se dedica a la agricultura, cultiva cacao orgánico y otros productos que son rentables en su zona. Los terrenos donde trabaja son  de sus padres quienes ya están en una edad muy avanzada para realizar las labores en el campo. Se siente muy contenta sacándole el máximo provecho a esta actividad donde debe mantener en buen estado las plantaciones y fertilizar sus terrenos con abono orgánico para cuidar la calidad de sus suelos. Luego de cosechar sus productos los vende en los mercados, los cuales están ubicados en una ciudad cerca a la suya. Espera seguir creciendo económicamente ya que su esposo trabaja como obrero en una empresa distribuidora de energía eléctrica y juntos esperan mejorar su calidad de vida. Este es su primer préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. En esta ocasión desea solicitar 500 soles para construir un ambiente en su vivienda para usarlo como cocina esperando mejorar su vivienda en beneficio de su familia.
texts.en:
Maribel is 26 years old, married, and has a daughter who is two years old. She lives with her family in her own home built of wood. Maribel works in agriculture, growing organic cacao and other products that are profitable in her region. The fields she works are those of her parents, who are no longer at an age to work in the fields. Maribel is happy to be getting the most out of her crops, maintaining them in good condition and fertilizing them with organic fertilizer to care for the quality of the soil. After harvesting her crops, she sells them in the market, which is located in a city nearby. She hopes to continue growing economically, as her husband works in an electric energy distribution company, and together they hope to improve their quality of life.

This is Maribel’s first loan with Kiva. She says she is grateful for the financial support to continue moving ahead, and that she promises to punctually make her payments. She is requesting 500 PEN to build a new room in her home to use as the kitchen, which she hopes will improve her home to benefit her family.

loans.use: to build a new room in her home to use as the kitchen.

loans.name: Fermin Antonio

texts.es: Fermín de 50 años de edad es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarle  lo mejor a su familia. Actualmente vive junto a su esposa y su hijo,  es muy trabajador, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica a ser agricultor siembra todos los años maíz y maicillo. Fermín  desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso visitó las oficinas de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Fermín is 50 years old and lives with his wife and their son. He has always been a very responsible about his family obligations and has provided the best for his wife and child. Fermín is a very hard working farmer who grows corn and sorghum, and has always done his work cheerfully and enthusiastically. 
 
Fermín hopes to boost his sales, so he visited the offices of INTEGRAL to apply for a loan that will allow him to purchase seeds, manure, fertilizers, pesticides, and other supplies. Fermín doesn't have another income source, so he hopes to rely on these loan funds and continue providing for his family's daily needs without difficulty.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, manure, fertilizers, pesticides, etc.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane lives in the Eldoret area of Kenya, which is a training ground for many of Kenya's Olympic runners. She has two children and has been doing agricultural work for three years. Her primary income sources are milk, eggs, and crops.

She stated what is most enjoyable about farming: 'Vending milk.'  Her biggest challenge is feeding the dairy cow. Animals on the farm have been given the name of 'The black & white.'

Jane was asked why she chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan. She replied that she has seen how Juhudi Kilimo has assisted farmers to own farming assets.  This client was also asked what was learned during Juhudi's required microfinance training session. She said that she learned the 'importance of [having] savings.'

Her highest monthly expense is family living expenses. When asked how this loan will benefit her family, Jane replied that she will be able to get enough food for her family, with the profits from her dairy business.

As part of Juhudi's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. Jane owns the following: 'cow, poultry, and bicycle,' but does not own 'pig, pump, motorcycle, or automobile.' Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. This borrower has in the household: 'mosquito net,' but does not have 'electricity, solar power, running water, sewing machine, TV, or DVD.'

Note: To create this loan profile, Juhudi Kilimo used a mobile device to gather information in the field and send the data to a central online repository, thus reducing paper use, making the process more efficient, and keeping costs down.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es: Luis de 59 años de edad es muy amable y trabajador, vive con su familia en casa propia,  él trabaja muy duro en su propia parcela donde siembra maíz y frijol; sus productos son de muy buena calidad cuando su cosecha ya esta lista sale a  comercializarla a los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su lugar de residencia. Luis  solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para contar con el dinero necesario e invertir en la compra de insumos agrícolas como controles de plaga, fertilizantes, abonos, semillas entre otras cosas que necesita para su siembra, y mejorar el terreno donde siembra que es el que muestra la fotografía, él ansía aumentar sus ventas para poder percibir mayores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Luis, 59, is friendly and hard working. He lives with his family in his own house. He works hard on his own land, where he plants corn and beans. His crops are high quality, and after harvesting, he sells the crops at various local markets. 

Luis has applied to INTEGRAL for a loan to buy farm supplies such as pest control, fertilizer, manure, and seed to plant and improve his land, which is shown in the photo. He wants to increase sales so that he can earn more and offer his family financial stability.

loans.use: to buy pest control, fertilizer, manure, and seed and to improve his land.

loans.name: Uzma

texts.en:
Uzma has expertise in embroidery, and has been using her skill to provide for her family for over seven years. She started this line of work at a very young age. During the initial years of her business, she barely made enough money to purchase the required material. Today she is proud to be famous in her community, for being the best at making beautiful patterns with thread and beads.

She obtained a loan of Rs. 20,000 from Kashf Foundation, which she will use to purchase spools of thread and packs of sequins, pearls and glittering material, in various colors. She says that the women in her community are becoming more demanding with the passage of time, and satisfying them is a challenge that Uzma has taken up.

loans.use: to purchase spools of thread with packs of sequins, pearls and glittering material, in various colors.

loans.name: Rukhsana

texts.en:
Rukhsana is 33 years old and a vigorous, married woman. She has had a business of hand-embroidery for the past six years. She is zealous about her work, and client demand is strong. But business challenges, combined with family expenditures, frustrate her nearly every day. Her husband is employed in a local factory, but he does not earn enough to support his family well, alone. Rukhsana’s embroidery patterns are very popular on her street and she is the best earning resource in her household. She is the mother of six children; all are school going.

She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of Rs 25,000. She will use the loan to buy raw materials, such as thread, sequins and pearls, in large quantities. These materials will enable her to complete the orders of her customers on time. She shared her dream of opening her own shop in the market, to display her work.

loans.use: to buy raw materials, such as thread, sequins and pearls, in large quantities.

loans.name: Rafia

texts.en:
Rafia is a 32-year-old, married woman. She has been stitching clothes for many years. She feels proud by contributing to her household income. 

When Rafia was not earning, her family was going through a severe financial crisis that compelled her to use her stitching skills in a productive manner. By this time, she has established a good clientele, but now she is having difficulty in fulfilling large orders. 

So, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 25,000 which she will use to buy a new stitching machine with some spools of thread and laces in various colors. She is in her second loan cycle, with good repayment history. She aspires to save money for her children's bright future.

loans.use: to buy a new stitching machine with some spools of thread and laces in various colors.

loans.name: Baskeri

texts.en: Baskeri is a 30-year-old married woman. Her husband is a rickshaw driver, and his income is not enough to support his family.  That is why Baskeri decided to lead her family and open a small general store in the corner of her house. She offers a variety of grocery items at reasonable prices and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. She makes enough to provide for her family. To make her store fully stocked she requested a loan of Rs 35,000 which she will use to buy packs of biscuits, salt, and beverages from the market at lower rates. In this way she would be able to meet the increasing demand consistently.  She is in her fourth loan cycle with good repayment history. She wishes to utilize part of her revenues to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy packs of biscuits, salt, and beverages.

loans.name: Hira

texts.en: Hira is 25 years old and a married mother of four children. The man shown in the photo is Hira’s husband who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family's expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. For this reason, Hira has applied for a loan of Rs 20,000, for her husband. He wants to buy new tires for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Hira is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires for her husband's vehicle

loans.name: José Marío

texts.es:
José tiene 35 años de edad, esta acompañado y tiene cinco hijos. Es un señor muy dedicado a su trabajo, actualmente es motorista en una ferretería. Ademas de su trabajo en su tiempo libre cultiva 3,500 metros cuadrados de maíz para tener los granos básicos para la alimentación de su familia. 
       
Los insumos que utiliza para  la siembra de maíz como fertilizantes y herbicidas, y los materiales que utilizara como laminas y clavos los adquiere en distintos  lugares de la ciudad. El tiempo que tarda el micro bus en llegar al cantón es de 30 minutos,y desde la entrada le toca cargar en la espalda los insumos hasta su casa. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar laminas para reforzar su casa y otra parte sera invertida en la siembra de frijoles. Así, comprara los insumos agrícolas para continuar trabajando la agricultura y obtener los granos para la alimentación de sus hijos. Ademas con el préstamo mejorara su vivienda.

Don José  quiere en un futuro no muy lejano remodelar y amueblar su casa para que sus futuros hijos y herederos puedan tener mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
José is 35 years old, has a life partner and five children. He is dedicated to his work. At present he is a driver at a hardware store. Besides this job he grows 3,500 square meters of corn to provide the basic grains to feed his family. He buys the supplies like sheeting and nails, fertilizers and herbicides for growing corn in different places in the city. It is a 30 minute ride by micro-bus to his district, and from the bus stop he carries the supplies to his house.

The loan he is asking for from Fundacion Campo is to buy sheeting to reinforce his house and the rest will be invested in planting beans. Thus buying more agricultural supplies to continue growing the food he needs to feed his children. In addition he will improve his house with this loan. 

In the not too distant future Jose would like to remodel and re-furnish his house to pass on to his children so they can enjoy a higher standard of living.

loans.use: to buy metal sheeting to reinforce his house and to invest in planting beans.

loans.name: José Carlos

texts.es:
osé tiene 40 años de edad, esta acompañado y ha procreado dos hijos. Se ha dedicado a la agricultura desde que tenia 13 años de edad, prácticamente a trabajado toda su vida en este rubro, donde fue su papá quien le enseño a trabajar, gracias a lo que le enseño su papá fue como salio adelante con su compañera de vida y sus 2 hijos, ademas de la agricultura don José sale a casar cangrejos al rio que pasa cerca de sus casa por la noche y es de esa forma que tiene otra fuente de ingresos para la familia.

Los insumos que utiliza para  la siembra de maíz como fertilizantes y herbicidas, los adquiere en la ciudad. El tiempo que tarda el bus en llegar a la entrada del cantón  es de 50 minutos, y porque la calle esta en mal estado no entra  carro hasta la casa entonces le toca cargar en la espalda los insumos hasta su casa. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 2 sacos de abono y 2 litros de herbicidas, para cultivar 3,500 metros cuadrados de maíz y asegurar el grano para la alimentación de sus hijos.

Don José, quiere en un futuro tener un casa mas grande y mejorarle mucho y ademas quiere seguir cultivando granos básicos así como lo ha venido haciendo desde hace mucho tiempo.
texts.en:
Don José is 40 and lives with his partner and their children. He has farmed nearly his whole life, since he was 13 and his father taught him to work. What José learned from his father has allowed him to provide for his partner and their children. In addition to farming, Don José goes to the river near his home to catch crabs, which provides another income source for his family. 

Don José goes to the city to purchases the supplies he uses to plant corn, taking a 50-minute bus ride. He then has to carry the supplies to his home on his back because the road where he lives is in poor condition that cars can't pass. 

The loan that José is applying for from the Campo Foundation is to purchase two bags of manure and two liters of herbicides for the cultivation of 3,500 square meters of corn and to provide food for his children. 

Don José wishes to buy a a bigger house and improve it. He also wants to continue growing staple grains as he's done for so long.

loans.use: to purchase two bags of manure and two liters of herbicides for the cultivation of 3,500 square meters of corn and to provide food for his children.

loans.name: José Dolores

texts.es:
Don José tiene 64 años de edad, es casado y tiene cinco hijos. se ha dedicado a la agricultura desde que tenia 12 años de edad, prácticamente a trabajado toda su vida en este rubro, donde fue su papá el mejor tutor que el ha conocido porque le enseño todo lo que sabe sobre la agricultura y gracias a lo que le enseño su papá fue como salio adelante, cuando decidió unirse en matrimonio con su esposa.  

Los insumos que utiliza para  la siembra de maíz como fertilizantes y herbicidas, los adquiere en la ciudad. El tiempo que tarda el camión en llegar al cantón es de 2 horas ida y venida, y desde la gruta le toca cargar en la espalda los insumos hasta su casa que esta como a 300 metros. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 7 sacos de abono, 4 litros de herbicidas , 1 litro de insecticida  y lo demás en mano de obra. Para cultivar 21,000 metros cuadrados de maíz y así pueda tener su cultivo en buenas condiciones con una buena nutrición y con un manejo mas adecuado.

Con la cosecha, tendrá una mejor alimentación para su familia porque generara mas ingresos y se le apoyara para la compra de insumos agrícolas y así pueda trabajar la agricultura y obtener los granos para la alimentación de su familia.

Don José, quiere seguir produciendo granos básicos como lo ha venido haciendo desde hace mucho tiempo atrás hasta que Dios se lo permita.
texts.en:
José, 64, is married and has five children. He has been farming since he was 12, practically his entire life. He father was the best mentor he has known, as he taught him everything he knows about farming. Thanks to his father's instruction, José has been able to get ahead and marry. 

Growing corn requires supplies such as fertilizer and weed killer, which he buys in the city. It takes two hours by truck to get back and forth from the canton, and he has to carry the supplies 300 meters on his back from the cavern to his house. He has applied to Fundación Campo to buy 7 sacks of manure, 4 liters of weed killer, and 1 liter of insecticide and to pay workers to plant 21,000 sq m of corn so that his plantings will be well nourished, in good condition, and appropriately tended. 

The harvest will provide better food for his family because it will generate more income. The loan will help him buy farm supplies so that he can work the land and harvest the corn he needs to feed his family. José wants to continue to grow grains as long as God allows, as he has been doing for a long time.

loans.use: to buy 7 sacks of manure, 4 liters of weed killer, and 1 liter of insecticide and to pay workers to plant 21,000 sq m of corn.

loans.name: Venancio

texts.en:
Venancio is a 42-year-old, married man, and a father of two young children. Venancio lives with his family in the town of Bien Unido, Bohol. He is a fisherman and has been in the fishing business for more than 20 years, now.

Venancio is asking for a loan to pay for the repair of the boat,  new fishing nets, and other equipment. With this use of the loan, he will be able to improve his fishing business and augment his income.

loans.use: to pay for the repair of the boat,  new fishing nets, and other equipment

loans.name: Isidro

texts.es: Isidro de 60 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 40 años siembra frijol y maíz y con las ventas que realiza de sus cosechas logra solventar los gastos que tiene en su hogar, es un hombre responsable, honesto y trabajador vive con su esposa en casa propia. Isidro está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar insumos para su cosecha como: fertilizantes, abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, etc. ya que con lo que gana no le alcanza para cubrir esos gastos y así tener mejores ingresos y tener una mejor estabilidad económica
texts.en:
Isidro is 60 and a responsible, honest, and hardworking farmer who lives with his wife in their own home. He has for 40 years grown corn and beans, and selling his harvest allows him to meet his household expenses. 

Isidro is applying for a loan to purchase supplies for the harvest, including fertilizers, manure, and seeds. The additional supplies that these loan funds will allow Isidro to purchase will help him generate higher income and achieve greater financial stability.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, manure, seeds, and other supplies.

loans.name: Pedro Telmo

texts.es: Pedro de 42 años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus cinco hijos; él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene 20 años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas , el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de incidencia agrícola, él  comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela fija, estas personas siempre prefieren su producto pues es de calidad y a precios realmente accesibles además el servicio es inigualable, adicional a su trabajo en el campo también trabaja de jornal en una finca cerca de su casa que le da ganancias extras para el mantenimiento del hogar; Pedro es un hombre dedicado a su labor, luchador siempre dispuesto a trabajar duro para alcanzar el éxito, quiere aprovechar el auge de su negocio para aumentar la producción y así poder tener mejores ganancias, necesita invertir en insumos pero no posee de capital suficiente por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla, abono, insecticida, herramienta, fertilizantes, etc. Pedro  tiene la confianza que así podrá darle a su familia la vida que se merecen.
texts.en:
Pedro, 42, lives with his life partner and their five children. He is a farmer, who grows corn and beans. He has been farming for 20 years and has garnered valuable experience which has led to better harvests. His land is located in an agricultural zone, and he sells his crops in the surrounding areas. He has regular customers because he offers quality products at affordable prices and unequaled service. He also works as a day laborer at a nearby farm to earn extra income for his household.

Pedro is dedicated to his trade and is always willing to work hard to achieve success. He wants to take advantage of increased business to raise production and earn more income. He needs to buy supplies, but he lacks sufficient funding. He has applied to INTEGRAL for a loan to buy seed, manure, insecticide, tools, fertilizer, and more. Pedro is certain that this will will enable him to give his family the life they deserve.

loans.use: to buy seed, manure, insecticide, tools, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Willian Alfredo

texts.es: William de 31 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 7 años y eso le ha dado la capacidad y el conocimiento necesario para asistir sus cultivos, su principal siembra es maíz y  maicillo, comercializa sus cultivos en agencias de compra-venta de granos básicos que están cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir algunos  gastos que su familia tiene, vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, cuando pasa la temporada agrícola el cliente se dedica a trabajar en la albañilería, William está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar insumos agrícolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, herbicidas, etc.  y así poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir dándole lo necesario a su familia sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
William, 31, has been a farmer for seven years, which has given him the necessary skills and knowledge to grow his crops, mainly corn and maicillo. He sells his crops to nearby grain dealers. He is able to pay some of his family's expenses with the profits from his sales. He lives in his own house with his wife and two children. After the growing season, he works as a bricklayer.

William has applied for a loan to buy farm supplies such as manure, seed, fertilizer, and herbicide so that he can plant. This will allow him to earn more and give his family everything it needs.

loans.use: to buy manure, seed, fertilizer, herbicide, etc.

loans.name: 04-04-10-Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hà operates a food stall/restaurant selling pig intestines. She is requesting a loan to to purchase pork and food to raise for reselling. 

Hà is 34 years old and she is married with two children.
Hà is the group leader of the 04-04-10-Nam Ngạn solidarity group, which consists of three members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province, and she has two dependents.

In 2008, Hà joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Hà has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Hà has been involved in this business for five years. The main hardship that Hà faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Hà hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase pork and food to raise for reselling.

loans.name: Amani

texts.en:
Amani is a 28-year-old, married woman. She has a shop where she sells and rents wedding dresses, in addition to accessories and bags. She opened her own shop in October 2010, and has a total of seven years of experience in this domain. Amani is a hard worker, well-known in her region for the quality of the products she provides. Her shop is located at the main road, which is a positive point toward attracting new customers and expanding her business.

Amani is applying for a YOUTH loan from Kiva's partner, Al Majmoua, to improve her accessories and bags collection with newly-released items. The new items will attract customers' attention, and will surely increase her income. As for the future, she is planning to expand her working space, and diversify departments to be each one specialized, with selected items.

loans.use: To improve her accessories and bags collection, by adding newly-released items
